mos def: my mind compliance like a science analyze my data not a fader on the face of the earth can blend rhythms like my will surreal spinnin ever-movin like evolution its retribution for sellin roots lessen futures im steppin to fuchsia sun rises my subconsciousness culminates constant live to see various i-de-ologies angles like isosceles read my auto-b-i-ography so many sides of me that vibrantly shine velocitys properly thick like mahogany dimes we findin beauty in this urban-gritty usually overlooked by many movin through the densely populated city assuming eventually we gotta get ova i document culture closer to the edge bolder than the print open to interpretation gazin deep into the glitz to my people raise you fists i know it stays intent whatever pays your rent but saves your soul you know the drill it go:
